snippet: Mitt Romney’s cultivation of politically influential figures is bearing fruit as he seeks a quick end to the Republican nomination fight.
abstract: Mitt Romney, who for years has been relentlessly cultivating local officials, finds his efforts bearing fruit as his allies in New Hampshire roll out their endorsements, help him raise money and provide access to their local get-out-the-vote networks.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s cultivation of politically influential figures is bearing fruit as he seeks a quick end to the Republican nomination fight.

headline.seo: In N.H., Allies in High Places Help Power the Romney Machine
headline.main: For Romney, Close Ties to Officials Bear Fruit
headline.print_headline: For Romney, Close Ties To Officials Bear Fruit
